title: Define package exports and public interfaces
description: agentforge/__init__.py and agentforge/core/__init__.py are TODOs. Decide on stable public API (version, key functions), and export them consistently.

title: Pytest reports no tests; add test layout/config
description: Problem: running \.\\.venv\\Scripts\\python -m pytest -p no:cacheprovider exits non-zero because 0 tests are collected. There is no tests/ directory, no test_*.py files, and no pytest config in pyproject.toml, so pytest returns exit code 5 (

title: Make generated agents more robust
description: Improve agent generation robustness so runtime agents behave reliably like the code machine: tighter validation, richer constraints/responsibilities, and stronger prompts/templates for consistency.

title: Fix language aggregation in repo analyzer
description: agentforge/core/repo_analyzer.py uses a dict comprehension to map extensions to language counts, which overwrites counts when multiple extensions map to the same language (e.g., .py and .pyi). Replace with a summing approach so language counts are accurate.

title: Review agents/ for improvements to agentforge agent generation
description: Review files under agents/ to identify improvements to agentforge's generated agents (prompt, validation, template, or schema). Capture concrete enhancements and implement where appropriate.

title: Pytest temp cleanup permission errors on Windows
description: Pytest fails during tmpdir cleanup with PermissionError on Windows temp dirs (e.g., agentforge-pytest). Investigate root cause and adjust test config or cleanup behavior.

title: Harden spec parsing and validation
description: agentforge/core/spec_parser.py only parses '# ' headings, ignores preamble text, and does not validate required sections or handle missing files. Add input validation, clearer errors, and support for expected sections.

title: Add CLI flag for codex path and docs for setup
description: Running gentforge generate --spec spec\\spec.md still fails because codex CLI is missing. Add a --codex-path option for generate/run (sets AGENTFORGE_CODEX_PATH) and document how to install Codex CLI or point to it in README.

title: Align agent schema with agent.md.j2 template fields
description: agentforge/templates/agent.md.j2 expects exclusions and communication_style, but agent_generator only enforces name/role/responsibilities/constraints. Decide on canonical agent schema, update validation and template accordingly, and document required/optional fields.

title: Prefer cmd shim for codex to avoid PowerShell invocation errors
description: agentforge generate fails when codex.ps1 is invoked via PowerShell on Windows. Update executor command resolution to prefer codex.cmd/bat when available, and keep ps1 fallback. Add test coverage for command resolution.

title: Implement CLI command dispatch for generate/run
description: agentforge/cli.py currently prints 'Not implemented yet' for both subcommands. Define CLI args (spec path, output dir, agent file, task input, context), wire to core functions, and return non-zero on errors.

title: Provide actionable error/help when codex CLI missing
description: Running gentforge generate --spec spec\\spec.md fails with Error: Codex executable not found on PATH. We should surface a clearer message with setup guidance (e.g., install Codex CLI, verify PATH) and possibly allow a configurable executable path via env var (AGENTFORGE_CODEX_PATH).

title: Codex output missing required agent fields
description: gentforge generate --spec spec\\spec.md fails with Agent missing required fields: ['constraints','responsibilities'] because Codex output omits required keys. Update the generation prompt to require all required fields (name, role, responsibilities, constraints) and optionally exclusions/communication_style, with explicit JSON schema example.

title: Exclude beads metadata from repo analysis
description: agentforge/core/repo_analyzer.py _IGNORE_DIRS omits .beads, so repo metrics include bead artifacts. Add .beads to ignored directories to avoid skewing counts.

title: Add unit tests for core modules
description: No tests exist for CLI/core behavior. Add tests covering repo_analyzer, spec_parser, prompt_builder, and executor error handling (mocked).

title: Add error handling/timeout for codex execution
description: agentforge/core/executor.py calls 'codex' with check=True but does not surface stderr, handle missing binary, or enforce timeouts. Add explicit error handling, timeouts, and clearer exceptions for CLI output.

title: Add place for spec.md
description: Create a clear home for spec.md in the repo (e.g., /spec/spec.md or /docs/spec.md), document expected location in README, and ensure CLI examples reference it. Provide a sample spec template to guide users.

title: Build agent generation workflow and template rendering
description: agentforge/core/agent_generator.py only validates JSON output. Implement end-to-end flow: parse spec, analyze repo, generate agents, render agent.md.j2 (likely via Jinja2), and write files to output directory. Add Jinja2 dependency if needed.

title: Spec parser rejects spec/spec.md missing Goals
description: Running gentforge generate --spec spec\\spec.md fails with Error: Spec missing required sections: ['Goals'] even though spec/spec.md includes a # Goals section. Investigate spec parsing of Windows line endings or BOM, and ensure required section detection handles the default template.

title: Use codex exec for non-interactive runs
description: gentforge generate calls codex without a TTY; codex CLI expects interactive mode and fails with 'Access is denied (os error 5)'. Switch to codex exec - and pass prompt via stdin, so codex runs non-interactively. Ensure wrapper scripts (.cmd/.ps1) still work.
